GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
tracing/eprobes: Do not allow eprobes to use $stack, or % for regs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit ba53c21ce9773743b8e0a8ada048c96ff2d55c67, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 7491e2c442781a1860181adb5ab472a52075f393. For more details please see the references link.
